about_the_game:
This Pack includes:

  • Su-22M4 WTD 61 (Rank 7 Germany);

  • Premium account for 20 days;

  • 2500 Golden Eagles.

The Su-22M4 WTD 61 represents the most advanced variant of this aircraft family, the GDR received 48 of these aircraft between 1984 and 1987, significantly bolstering the strike potential of the GDR.

While known for its impressive ground strike capability, the Su-22M4 WTD 61 is certainly not lacking in air-to-air weaponry. It comes equipped with a large number of countermeasures, two powerful 30mm cannons and up to six R-60MK air-to-air missiles! You’ll also be able to equip a wide variety of ground ordnance, including numerous bombs of various sizes and large-caliber unguided rockets like the devastating S-13OF and S-25O. Several guided options are also available, including the laser-guided S-25L, Kh-29L, and Kh-25ML, as well as the TV-guided Kh-29T! The Su-22M4 features a fully customizable loadout, allowing you to construct the perfect set of weaponry for every situation.

With a vast array of ordnance and a ballistic computer, you’ll be able to effectively and accurately engage any threat on the ground and in the sky.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!

  • Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account.
detailed_description:
This Pack includes:

  • Su-22M4 WTD 61 (Rank 7 Germany);

  • Premium account for 20 days;

  • 2500 Golden Eagles.

The Su-22M4 WTD 61 represents the most advanced variant of this aircraft family, the GDR received 48 of these aircraft between 1984 and 1987, significantly bolstering the strike potential of the GDR.

While known for its impressive ground strike capability, the Su-22M4 WTD 61 is certainly not lacking in air-to-air weaponry. It comes equipped with a large number of countermeasures, two powerful 30mm cannons and up to six R-60MK air-to-air missiles! You’ll also be able to equip a wide variety of ground ordnance, including numerous bombs of various sizes and large-caliber unguided rockets like the devastating S-13OF and S-25O. Several guided options are also available, including the laser-guided S-25L, Kh-29L, and Kh-25ML, as well as the TV-guided Kh-29T! The Su-22M4 features a fully customizable loadout, allowing you to construct the perfect set of weaponry for every situation.

With a vast array of ordnance and a ballistic computer, you’ll be able to effectively and accurately engage any threat on the ground and in the sky.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!

  • Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account.

  • Processor:Dual-Core 2,4 GHz
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 460 or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:8 MB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
